name: JOLLY BOAT (LAURENT  GILES)

images.alt: Jolly Boat (Laurent Giles) photo on sailboatdata.com

notes:
Traditional open cockpit day boat. Based on an earlier version designed for plywood construction.
Length w/bowsprit: 20'/6.1m.
Ketch (balanced lug) or gaff head sloop.
Ballast consists of sacks filled with gravel.
